basic.description: This internship provides supervised practical field experience in various professional settings related to couple and family therapy, including human services, agencies, hospitals, educational facilities, and government. may be repeated to a maximum of twelve semester hours. S/U grade only.
basic.subject: FAD
basic.title: Internship in Marriage and Family Therapy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MFT major status. Corequisite: FAD 8964.
